attributes.action: actively pursue the attainment of a permanent human presence on the moon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently this country plays no involvement in supporting human space flight and exploration. This petition is designed to request that this country works alongside the American vision for space exploration. There is both large scientific and economic potential from a permanent human settlement on the moon, so it should be seriously considered as one of this countries top priorities.
